name: A Simple Game (yuLinDeveloper)
description:
A simple game, but there was an error in the loading process.

NEVER PLAY CRACKED GAMES!

You downloaded a game and found it was a paid game.

You found a crack patch on the Internet, but you installed it into the game root directory without noticing its name.

After entering the game, you find that the content of the game has changed greatly.

Salute :  RustyLakeStudio

Warning:There are thrilling elements
